original_text: The people do not have anything to eat. So send them away now. Tell them to go to the farms and villages that are near here. Then they can buy some food for themselves to eat.’
korean_text: 무리를 보내어 두루 촌과 마을로 가서 무엇을 사 먹게 하옵소서

sentences.original_text: The people do not have anything to eat.
Tell them to go to the farms and villages
Then they can buy some food
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 그들은 음식을 살 수 있습니다.
